title: A player by the name of "aamazing" is scripting in high elo soloq

embed.description: Create & discover new Champion builds/strategies, check your Summoner statistics and try our powerful LoL charts.

body:
Title. He's using autocarry, evadee and xerath scripts.
Link in case of namechange.

Inb4 thread deleted and he scripts to challenger because naming and shaming is against the 'summoner's code' lel.
Inb4 contact support: the monkeys don't know what a script is and just tell you the tribunal will take care of it even though there's no report option for cheaters (or a tribunal).

replies.body:
You should definitely lodge a support ticket mate, i know you get the standard copy pasta responses but they do actually follow up on these things.

All the best

> [{quoted}](name=xhausted,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=RneBpdr8,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-02-11T07:03:33.442+0000)
>
> You should definitely lodge a support ticket mate, i know you get the standard copy pasta responses but they do actually follow up on these things.
> 
> All the best

No they don't. You clearly haven't reported a scripter through tickets before.

Yes i have, i've also reported elo boosters and extremely abusive people. 

dont assume, dont be lazy, and above all dont be a little b*itch

> [{quoted}](name=xhausted,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=RneBpdr8,comment-id=000200010000,timestamp=2015-02-11T07:34:04.049+0000)
>
> Yes i have, i've also reported elo boosters and extremely abusive people. 
> 
> dont assume, dont be lazy, and above all dont be a little b*itch

They haven't been banned. Prove me wrong with evidence. I made 2 support tickets about Mog and nothing but when I made a thread about him he magically got a 2 week ban within a day.

There literally isn't even a player report option in support tickets since like a year ago. Pls get informed.

Again you just trying to find excuses to cover your laziness, if you have an issue thats very serious, Report it via ticket.

This matter is closed.

Proof of your ticket?

proof of the other tickets?


also you said you weren't going to report because all you get is an automated response.


and yes i am evading this conversation ( READ: Childish Rant) because its going in circles, i have better things to do with my time.


Peace

> [{quoted}](name=xhausted,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=RneBpdr8,comment-id=0002000100000000000000000000,timestamp=2015-02-11T08:15:15.044+0000)
>
> Proof of your ticket?
> 
> proof of the other tickets?
> 
> 
> also you said you weren't going to report because all you get is an automated response.
> 
> 
> and yes i am evading this conversation ( READ: Childish Rant) because its going in circles, i have better things to do with my time.
> 
> 
> Peace

While I asked for proof first, I know you don't have any and I've already sh**i**t on your pathetic argument, so I'll humour you.

http://i.imgur.com/bCXCqxu.jpg

This is the best response I've received so far from a report ticket. 5 months after this ticket Aborb was either banned or he quit (his main was actually permanently banned for boosting at the time of me sending the ticket and yet they still didn't even look at the IPs). RiQt still plays to this day even though the copypasta assured me that 'justice comes on swift wings'.

Neither player has namechanged. The only thing I didn't mention in the ticket was that they were both using evadee as well but a player shouldn't be expected to name every script the cheater is using.

And I think this was back when player reports was a thing in tickets, since that's gone support staff aren't even trained to handle reports beyond saying 'report them after the game and they'll be banned'.

And this isn't even the first thread about aamazing. Do you honestly think people haven't sent tickets about him? He's been scripting for several months if not a year now.

141 wins 76 losses as Xerath last season.

Holy %%%%.

The thing is, if anyone is going to get a ban here, it will probably be you, sadly, that's how things around here work.
For a 'scripter' he sure does have a pretty low KDA and w/l ratio, I'm no scripting expert tho

> [{quoted}](name=Bronze V Irelia,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=RneBpdr8,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-02-11T06:42:18.552+0000)
>
> For a 'scripter' he sure does have a pretty low KDA and w/l ratio, I'm no scripting expert tho

Probably because his decision making is silver level. Just spec him when he plays Xerath, that's when it's most obvious.
No reply, butthurt downvote. Looks like another internet argument victory has been achieved. Time to get out the celebratory dorito cake and hang my mountain dew soaked fedora to dry.
